forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth envelops the day, as the sun peeks through a soft veil of clouds, creating a serene blend of light and shadow. With temperatures expected to hover in the mid-60s, the atmosphere carries a pleasant hint of crispness, invigorating yet calming. The west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, playfully nudging the leaves of the trees—their subtle rustling adding rhythm to the day. While the morning may have glimpses of fog lingering in pockets around the coastline, it seems the majestic Golden Gate casts its welcoming outline against a backdrop free of heavy haze, allowing for stunning vistas.

As the day progresses, so does the charm of the city, though evening will usher in a blanket of clouds, inviting residents to trade their sunlit strolls for cozy gatherings indoors. A light jacket or a comfortable sweater would serve you well against the gentle chill of the night air. Consider meandering through local cafés, savoring a warm drink, or indulging in the rich culinary offerings of the area—a perfect way to appreciate the city’s vibrant spirit.
